select ei.id, ei.name enterpriseName, ei.status, (select name from sys_dictionary where type_code='ent_status' and code=ei.status and valid=1)statusName, ei.social_credit_code socialCreditCode, ei.link_phone linkPhone, ei.contacts, ic.name industryCategoryName, ei.has_risks_report hasRisksReport, t.name techniqueName, sd.name cityName, ei.risk_level from enterprise_info ei left join industry_category ic on (ei.industry_id=ic.id and ic.valid=1) left join enterprise_mapping_technique emt on (ei.id=emt.ent_id and emt.valid=1) left join technique t on (emt.tech_id=t.id and t.valid=1) left join sys_dictionary sd on (sd.type_code = 'canton' and ei.canton_code = sd.code and sd.valid=1) where
ei.status < #{queryParam.status} and
ei.status = #{queryParam.status} and
ei.status > #{queryParam.status} and
ei.risk_level = #{queryParam.riskLevel} and
ei.valid=1 ORDER by ei.update_time desc

select ei.id, ei.audit_remark auditRemark, ei.name enterpriseName, ei.social_credit_code socialCreditCode, (select name from industry_category where id = ic.level_one_id and valid=1) industryCategoryName, (select name from industry_category where id = ic.level_two_id and valid=1) industryLargeCategoryName, (select name from industry_category where id = ic.level_three_id and valid=1) industrySmallCategoryName, ic.name industryName, ic.level_one_id industryCategoryId, ic.level_two_id industryLargeCategoryId, ic.level_three_id industrySmallCategoryId, ei.industry_id industryId, ei.longitude, ei.latitude, t.name techniqueName, emt.tech_id techniqueId, ei.link_phone linkPhone, ei.contacts, ei.postcode, (select name from sys_dictionary where type_code='canton' and code=sd.parent_code and valid=1)provinceName, sd.name cityName, concat(left(ei.canton_code,2),'0000')provinceCode, ei.canton_code cityCode, ei.address, ei.yield, ei.income, ei.employees_number employeesNumber, ei.start_time startTime, em.name emissionModeName, ei.emission_mode_id emissionModeId, ei.has_risks_report hasRisksReport, (select name from sys_dictionary where type_code='ent_scale' and code=ei.scale and valid=1)scaleName, ei.status, (select name from sys_dictionary where type_code='ent_status' and code=ei.status and valid=1)statusName from enterprise_info ei left join industry_category ic on (ei.industry_id=ic.id and ic.valid=1) left join enterprise_mapping_technique emt on (ei.id=emt.ent_id and emt.valid=1) left join technique t on (emt.tech_id=t.id and t.valid=1) left join sys_dictionary sd on (sd.type_code = 'canton' and ei.canton_code = sd.code and sd.valid=1) left join emission_mode em on (em.id = ei.emission_mode_id and em.valid = 1) where ei.id = #{enterpriseId} and ei.valid=1

select ei.id, ei.name, ei.status, (select name from sys_dictionary where type_code='ent_status' and code=ei.status and valid=1)statusName, concat(left(ei.canton_code,2),'0000')provinceCode, ei.scale, pi.id mainProductId, pi.type mainProductType, pi.name mainProductName, emt.tech_id techniqueId, t.code techniqueCode, em.type emissionModeTypeCode, ei.yield, ei.industry_id industryId, ei.start_time startTime, ei.social_credit_code socialCreditCode, ei.canton_code cantonCode from enterprise_info ei left join enterprise_mapping_product emp on (emp.ent_id=ei.id and emp.is_main_product=1 and emp.valid=1) left join product_info pi on (pi.id=emp.prod_id and pi.valid=1) left join enterprise_mapping_technique emt on (ei.id=emt.ent_id and emt.valid=1) left join technique t on (t.id=emt.tech_id and t.valid=1) left join emission_mode em on (em.id = ei.emission_mode_id and em.valid = 1) where ei.id = #{enterpriseId} and ei.valid=1

select ei.id, ei.status, (select name from sys_dictionary where type_code='ent_status' and code=ei.status and valid = 1) statusName, ei.need_survey_upgrade needSurveyUpgrade, ei.risk_level riskLevel from enterprise_info ei where ei.id = #{enterpriseId} and ei.valid=1
select id entId, latitude, longitude from enterprise_info where id = #{entId} and valid =1
select id entId, latitude, longitude from enterprise_info where id != #{entId} and valid =1 and latitude is not null and longitude is not null
select id entId, latitude, longitude from enterprise_info where valid =1 and latitude is not null and longitude is not null
